org.apache.flink.util

枚举 OperatingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<OperatingSystem>
      • org.apache.flink.util.OperatingSystem
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<OperatingSystem>

    @Internal
public enum OperatingSystem
extends java.lang.Enum<OperatingSystem>
    An enumeration indicating the operating system that the JVM runs on.

    • 枚举常量概要

      枚举常量 
      枚举常量和说明
      FREE_BSD 
      LINUX 
      MAC_OS 
      SOLARIS 
      UNKNOWN 
      WINDOWS 

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static java.lang.String FREEBSD_OS_PREFIX
      The expected prefix for FreeBSD.
      private static java.lang.String LINUX_OS_PREFIX
      The expected prefix for Linux operating systems.
      private static java.lang.String MAC_OS_PREFIX
      The expected prefix for Mac OS operating systems.
      private static OperatingSystem os
      The enum constant for the operating system.
      private static java.lang.String OS_KEY
      The key to extract the operating system name from the system properties.
      private static java.lang.String SOLARIS_OS_INFIX_1
      One expected infix for Solaris.
      private static java.lang.String SOLARIS_OS_INFIX_2
      One expected infix for Solaris.
      private static java.lang.String WINDOWS_OS_PREFIX
      The expected prefix for Windows operating systems.

    • 方法详细资料

      • values

        public static OperatingSystem[] values()
        按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序, 返回 包含这些常量的数组。该方法可用于迭代 常量, 如下所示: 
        for (OperatingSystem c : OperatingSystem.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        返回:
        按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序返回的包含这些常量的数组

      • valueOf

        public static OperatingSystem valueOf(java.lang.String name)
        返回带有指定名称的该类型的枚举常量。 字符串必须与用于声明该类型的枚举常量的 标识符完全匹配。(不允许有多余 的空格字符。)
        参数:
        name - 要返回的枚举常量的名称。
        返回:
        返回带有指定名称的枚举常量
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 如果该枚举类型没有带有指定名称的常量
        java.lang.NullPointerException - 如果参数为空值

      • getCurrentOperatingSystem

        public static OperatingSystem getCurrentOperatingSystem()
        Gets the operating system that the JVM runs on from the java system properties. this method returns UNKNOWN, if the operating system was not successfully determined.
        返回:
        The enum constant for the operating system, or UNKNOWN, if it was not possible to determine.

      • isWindows

        public static boolean isWindows()
        Checks whether the operating system this JVM runs on is Windows.
        返回:
        true if the operating system this JVM runs on is Windows, false otherwise

      • isLinux

        public static boolean isLinux()
        Checks whether the operating system this JVM runs on is Linux.
        返回:
        true if the operating system this JVM runs on is Linux, false otherwise

      • isMac

        public static boolean isMac()
        Checks whether the operating system this JVM runs on is Windows.
        返回:
        true if the operating system this JVM runs on is Windows, false otherwise

      • isFreeBSD

        public static boolean isFreeBSD()
        Checks whether the operating system this JVM runs on is FreeBSD.
        返回:
        true if the operating system this JVM runs on is FreeBSD, false otherwise

      • isSolaris

        public static boolean isSolaris()
        Checks whether the operating system this JVM runs on is Solaris.
        返回:
        true if the operating system this JVM runs on is Solaris, false otherwise

      • readOSFromSystemProperties

        private static OperatingSystem readOSFromSystemProperties()
        Parses the operating system that the JVM runs on from the java system properties. If the operating system was not successfully determined, this method returns UNKNOWN.
        返回:
        The enum constant for the operating system, or UNKNOWN, if it was not possible to determine.
